org.rrd4j.core

Class RrdFileBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rrd4j.core.RrdBackend
      • org.rrd4j.core.RrdFileBackend
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RrdRandomAccessFileBackend

    public abstract class RrdFileBackend
extends RrdBackend
    An abstract backend which is used to store RRD data to ordinary files on the disk.

    Every backend storing RRD data as ordinary files should inherit from it, some check are done in the code for instanceof.
